content: पेश(ष-स)ल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Soft, tender, delicate; पुष्पचापमिव पेशलं स्मरः <ls>R. 11. 45</ls>; <ls n="R.">9. 40</ls>; <ls>Me. 93.</ls> {@--2@} Thin, slender (as waist); <ls>R. 13. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Lovely, beautiful, charming, good; <ls>Bv. 2. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Expert, clever, skilful; <ls>Bh. 3. 56</ls>; एकोन्मीलनपेशलः <ls>U. 6. 34.</ls> {@--5@} Crafty, fraudulent. {@--6@} Decorated, adorned. --लं Beauty. --लः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
